name: JuiceTurf
description:
A high action multiplayer game with quick rounds.
Up to 8 players, 2 maps, and 10 fun. Hope you find some joy from it!

Made by:
@JerboGames
@NoxLof

Known Issue: If you host without entering your IP the game tries to find it for you, but if it fails it throws and error in the background and you'll have to restart.

Fix: Just enter your own IP whenever you are hosting!
